name: The Creative's Mind
description:
Stuck on the bus, the clock is ticking down for The Creative to finish their project. Delve deeper and deeper into their mind to help them finish without getting distracted by intrusive thoughts. Collect timer resets to help stall the inevitable. 

(For ease, I advise putting the game in full screen)

Controls

A/D - Move
Space - Jump
E - Reset timer (requires timer resets)

Made for the Ludum Dare 48 Jam -- "Deeper and deeper"
